tool_description: Search the web for files, videos, audios, eBooks & much more.
name: FilePursuit
title: FilePursuit

api_list.name: pursuit
api_list.description: Search for a query in file names and path

optional_parameters.name: filetype
optional_parameters.description: File Extension, only one file extension accepted per query

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Type of files (Accepted values: video, audio, ebook, archive, mobile)

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sort by ascending or descending values (Accepted values: sizeasc, sizedesc, dateasc, datedesc, fileasc, filedesc), only one accepted per query. By default datedesc is selected.

api_list.name: discover
api_list.description: Discover every file crawled by FilePursuit using links and domains

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Type of result (Accepted values: filelinks, all)
